website_summaries.verdict: You’ll appreciate the large 10.1-inch screen on this sharp-looking tablet, which is great for gaming and streaming video.
pros: 2GB of RAM and 16GB of storage space
Stand angle is flexible, so you can use the tablet in the most comfortable position for your needs
Speakers are clearer than you’d expect
cons: Battery reliability is a question mark, as it may occasionally struggle to charge properly

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many tablets, including Apple. I liked this one because of the flp stand but I was pessimistic. I gave it a shot because of the brand Lenovo. Of the many that I have bought, they were cumbersome, slow, cheap and simply no good. Surprised! 1st, I stream, surprised how well it streams! 2. Touch screen, great! Many tablets are too sensitive or not sensitive. 3. Picture, Great! 4. Sound, surprised. Very good! Much better than the iPad. Also I stream sports, it too was excellent. The NHL game was clear with no buffering. The price at $118 was very surprising, a quality unit at that price? A great value with excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Minn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tablet for use as a video and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tablet for use as a video and audio playback device, utility camera and base for endoscopic photos inside equipment. The right size for portability and ease of viewing. Terrific battery life. Quite a pleasant experience so far. The basic Android package without excessive fluff was a major selling point. Nice work Lenovo! This is not another commodity tablet that looks like all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: It took purchasing 3 Tablets to find this one. I absolutely Love It!!! I like to play games, listen to music, watch videos & take pictures. This is perfect for it all! The sound, the picture the awesome built in stand....Omgoodness! Lol Although the mailman dropped my box on my porch so far it is still good. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable E-Book "Reader" alternative....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this during Black-Friday event for $99, at that price it was definitely worth it ( much more and it wouldn't be ). Pros: -Size -Comfortable and easy to carry/hold with one hand -Built-in stand -Good battery life ( so far ) -Actually sounds good for a tablet -Nice screen to view and touch Cons: ( Not really a con at $99, but would be for normal asking price ) -Mid-Level Processor -Only 1gb of Ram -16gb of storage As an inexpensive e-book reader that does more than just read books, this is a good device and value if bought on sale. The device is responsive, comfortable, and has a decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Howie7211

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected...
customer_reviews.text: This Lenovo Yoga Tab is great. Easy to use, built well and a much better picture than I expected. Is it better than top of the line Samsung? No. However, the colors are accurate and the sharpness is very good. I have used it to stream movies and watch DirecTV. I know it is slower to react than more powerful models. I am OK with that. The camera isn't near as good as my Samsung S6 and I am OK with that too. I am only going to use this for watching movies, sports and stream live TV... Awesome value.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald A Tamborello

customer_reviews.title: I have been through the online forums and issues with the battery appear to be pretty common. The only option is to send it ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the tablet won't charge (there is no indicator light) and won't turn on. When you plug it in the back gets incredibly hot really fast but it never turns on. I have been through the online forums and issues with the battery appear to be pretty common. The only option is to send it back for repairs. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday affordable tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item originally for a road trip so I could watch downloaded shows from Netflix and use the Kindle app, now I use it mainly to browse the Internet and as a remote for my chromecast TV. It is not a super fancy tablet and probably shouldn't be used for things such as gaming, but it works great for everyday use. The battery life is outstanding, I could watch hours of movies and still have half remaining. I only have to charge it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: CVK

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this the first of May. By the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this the first of May. By the first of July, the battery wouldn't charge and they won't take it back. I'm stuck with a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: 1vitruvianman

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't hold a charge after only two months of using the tablet, have to keep it plugged in to operate. Checked with Lenovo and the tablet is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Sluggish tablet/ Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: It has become horribly slow and prone to crashes even after doing a factory reset, nothing changed. Simply opening a chrome browser and inputting a website name, the word disappear, and it gives capital letter to start each word. If you try to delete, it won't, and you end up with five words in a row. Restart, Reset nothing works. Way too sluggish even for basic tasks. It has a good battery life that is the only good point I can attribute to it. I wish I had chosen a different tablet.
customer_reviews.author: mOnaj

customer_reviews.title: Great video tablet with kickstand
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the price. Perfect for watching SD video. Not for HD video. Great battery life. I recommend getting the protective case with it as it automatically turns the screen on and off when you open and close the cover. Also, the cover works excellent for hanging the tablet over my steering wheel when I'm parked for a perfect view it also works on my visor. This is a great tablet for video and very light tasks, but not much else. video is what I bought this tablet for though so I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Afa

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a good buy!  Outstanding Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding tablet! I previously owned another Yoga tablet and wanted to stay with the brand and design. This tablet is an upgrade in RAM and processor from my previous. Wow, what a nice overall system. The display is superb. The sound is truly amazing considering it comes from a tablet. It is rich true stereo quality. I bought the 2gb ram model which is double the ram in my previous tablet. It is super fast. I wholeheartedly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: RobKimWill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. Only reasons I gave it 4 stars in a too short charging cord, and even though the camera lens is cool that it rotates, it is off to the side and makes it difficult to take self shots. I have it on my home wifi and the screen size and speakers make the web a lot more fun than my small screen cell phone. I am still learning my way around and was surprised when watching youtube, that it took over my smart tv, and brought youtube to that screen.
customer_reviews.author: SueLT

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but too slow. Would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cheap tablet, but extremely slow. I only really use netflix, music, google docs, and other basic apps yet the entire system runs slow. Touch response is also so slow it is frustrating. When I bought it I had to update it multiple times, each time taking around an hour, before it was up to date. Overall, it is not bad but I would not purchase again. The camera is extremely grainy and the speakers sound almost muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Tablet, Just a Little Slow
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for a little over a year and a half now and it is still working good. There are a lot of good things about it, such as the stand, it has been very useful having that. It also has an amazing battery life and also really great speakers for a tablet. The speakers on the tablet are actually a lot better than either one of my laptops. I would have given it 5 stars, but there is one thing that I don't like about it, and that is it can be quite slow and sluggish at times. It's been that way since I first bought it. Other than that, it is a really good tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Is it really New
customer_reviews.text: I was rather surprised when I went to open the box, one of the seals had been cut which was not a concern. After opening the box and taking the tablet out, I found finger prints all over the screen. I have never purchased a computer before that looked like it had been played with. After future inspection, this computer was returned. I found even the ties on the cables were removed. This should have been noted that it was an open box item.. It had been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bikeman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, asymetric design is awkward to hold, and battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: I've had a series of different tablets over the years, mostly for reading PDFs and downloaded content. This lenovo is quite heavy, the goofy thick round side-handle design is just awkward. The real failure is battery life, which with wifi on and no apps running is maybe a day, maybe. This thing probably looked great in some design review and as a sales pitch, but for actual usability, or a device I can throw in my backpack and not worry about the delicate thing shattering, or just being charged for use when I need it, it's a total loss. I didn't give it one star since, I guess it technically runs apps and whatever.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Excellence of design and manufacture
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Lenovo product I've owned and you just have to be impressed with the quality of build that Lenovo puts in it's products. I'm not a "power" user; I just want to check emails, and read my Kindle and e-newspapers when I'm away from home. There's a bunch of specs that can be related, but for me it's battery life and feel. I'm glad I made this purchase and recommend to others to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Used-to-was, but now retired

customer_reviews.title: A really good tablet.  Nicely built.  Well thought out.  I Love the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Someone put some thought into this. It's a great tablet. It has plenty of memory and a card slot. the hinge on the back makes it hugely useful. and the hinge also doubles as extra battery to charge a cell phone if needed. i put a 32 gb card in it and optimized android to my likings and it has become my favorite thing. ADDENDUM: It's been several days since i got the tablet. I'm still enjoying it. It hasn't skipped a beat. My dog Hootie would like it if I would put it down and play with him more...
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nocella

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful built in stand that holds the non user replaceable battery
customer_reviews.text: Basically a replacement for my original silver Yoga 3 whos battery finally lost charging abilites. Unfortunately the battery is not user replaceable and the various fix it shops do not want to mess with it either. Very disappointing in this aspect. But every thing else about this tablet first rate/top notch. Love the built in stand the most. In reality my original silver version has worked for over 5 years so considering this new one cost under $200, paying $40 a year average seems well worth it in today's throw away world. T
customer_reviews.author: Bacardi 8

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I bought this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Harmony media center controller. I love the built in stand. I din't have to buy anything extra. I set it on my side table and can control all of my junk from my comfy chair. The screen is bright and has plenty of detail. Video is clear and clean. I'm amazed at the sound this thing puts out. It is totally immersive even without a hefty bass sound. Battery life is also impressive. The battery side of the device is also easy to hold and this thing makes a great ebook reader.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Im really enjoying this tablet. Great battery life and charges pretty quick. Very easy to hold with the Yoga feature. Screen quality is very good for the price of the tablet. Just as good as my Samsung Tab E which I gave away once I started using this one. Very good quality and great value! I'm happy with the purchase for sure.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Nicholson III

customer_reviews.title: Solid little device, replaced several devices to be an all in one!
customer_reviews.text: This little tablet has been just awesome. I use it as a digital photo frame when it's just sitting on the bookshelf (the rotating stand was what sold me) and also as a Netflix device for the kitchen (can hang over the sink while I do dishes) and to send emails, and to listen to music... It's been exactly what I needed. This replaced a digital frame, an internet TV, a stereo (with a Bluetooth speaker connected) and a computer upstairs. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kern

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase a tablet for my husband after he had dropped his and cracked to the point of no return! After much research I stumbled upon this one. The reviews were good so I decided to take the plunge. It did not disappoint! My husband uses it practically all the time! Great picture quality and great sound! It has virtual surround sound and it is pretty awesome! He doesn't do any gaming so the speed quality is good. He watches a lot of videos and he doesn't have any issues. So overall great little tablet and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a bad battery so it was shipped that way
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a bad battery so it was shipped that way. Unacceptable. The previous owner's info was not wiped also.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: All the functionality of an iPad w/o the hefty price...and screen is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product - affordable, crystal clear screen. Didn't want to pay for an ipad and didn't have to in order to get same functionality. Great size to tuck in a pocketbook too. Bought as a gift and ended up keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Allegretto

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy but Caution on Upgrades Abilities
customer_reviews.text: I love Lenovo products and got this for my wife and the picture quality is fantastic for her shows and movies. Earphone Jack, power hookup, is good and the stand is such a fantastic idea. Some Streaming Apps are a problem and found out that certain models or manufacturing dates CANNOT take an update higher than 6.0.1 and streaming needs a 7.0 or higher. Found this out right from Lenovo suppot. So be aware of this but still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SnapShot

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound... Great Picture...and THATS IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love ALMOST EVERYTHING about my tablet... Except....IT IS SOOOOOOO SLOW... I can put in a URL... And go make myself a sandwich... And when I come back it might still be trying to pull it up.... The sound system is AMAZINGGG...The picture quality is AWESOME... so I really didn't want to send it back..But... It has become so frustrating that I rarely even use my tablet. Another Dust Collector...
customer_reviews.author: aSia RuLes!

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations and performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Meets expectations and performs as advertised. Wanted something different (Not Apple, Not Samsung, not Microsoft). After using it for a week, decided to buy a case for it - it's sturdy, but just use to having a case. It has locked up a few time - 1GB RAM. Pros: Speakers sound great, overall design, battery life, not loaded with Apps/bloatware Cons: Only 16GB, inadvertently hit the power button, (sometimes) in portrait mode
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your time!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for 6 months before the battery took literally all day to charge. On top of that, it only last about 4 hours tops on a charge before you have to charge it all day again! The OS Interface seems to have an old appearance. Also, it will not run PUBG even on the lowest graphic setting. Should have spent just a little more for a Samsung Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tablet. Battery lasts a long time, sound is pretty amazing for a tablet, andbeing able to draw on the screen using any pen is great for my art work. Its not an amazing ground bfeaking piece of technology, but a well rounded tablet with great speakers and battery life. I only wish internal storage was a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: yada johnson

customer_reviews.title: Defective touch
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped functioning smoothly within a month of purchase. The touch became too sensitive and now it is completely broken. It automatically clicks and changes stuff without even touching the screen. I would be really cautious buying this.
customer_reviews.author: ManVel

customer_reviews.title: Not Built To Last!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in Feb. of 2017 and loved it! It was so cool and nice to use. Unfortunately, it is now Oct. of 2018 and this Tablet just bit the dust! So disappointed that I barely got over a year and a half of use out of this! I believe the battery died, so now I am typing this review out on my new Tablet I had to replace it with! Unless you are into throwing away good money, then go ahead and order one these....otherwise save your money and get yourself something else!
customer_reviews.author: Donner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this tablet
customer_reviews.text: To start with the design of this tablet is not to good. It's uncomfortable to use and it's slow but the worst part is the battery. It died in less than one year and to replace it , you have to completely disassemble it. Also the cheapest battery I could find was in China for 45 dollars. So I didn't bother to fix it. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: ken a holman

customer_reviews.title: Failure at less than a year old
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has used very lightly in a controlled environment. Less than a year old and the headphone jack has failed. I'm extremely disappointed in the lack of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great small tablet but no EX-FAT
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small tablet for our kids to use during car trips. We love the ridiculously long battery life, built in stand, and great sound from the speakers. It's a bit heavy but the round spine makes it easier to hold... my little son who has trouble holding a full size iPad likes this one better. My only complaint is that it only reads FAT formatted cards, so I had to convert some movies to be less than 4gb... really should be EX-FAT compatible.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Des appointing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was des appointed with the quality of the product over all. The on and off bottom seems pretty week. Also the touch screen sensitivity is pretty high even after changing it. Every time I type letter get typed multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Misalb

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC TABLET!!  Bought 2 for me and 2 for friends
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. I got one for me, liked it so much bought a second one for me. Then bought two more in the last few weeks for friends who needed a tablet. Good size, built in stand convenient, just a terrific unit. Everyone is happy with it. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zee in CA

customer_reviews.title: there is not a better tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these for my company. If this is your price point for a tablet, there is not a better tablet on the market, period! It's loud, it's fast for it's price. The screen is vibrant. The stand is handy. It has a nice weight to it. Seriously, for basic tablet functions, it's by far worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Page

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but odd
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but odd . The touch is very sensitive which is irritating sometimes. The headphone port is in a odd place when using the stand . Volume is not loud at all but overall nice tablet very clear picture when watch Netflix or something. Camera is okay but nothing to always use .
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. It gives me everything I need which is to be able to surf the web, watch Netflix movies and download movies from Google Play. I'm even impressed with the t.v. casting capabilities. I can also connect via Bluetooth to my cordless headphones and iHome cordless speaker. Just got it but so far it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eldrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Needs
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. The battery life is extraordinary - no more need to recharge on a daily basis. The picture is bright and clear, something these "old" eyes needed. The sound is perfect. I use the tablet mainly for video presentations to my Bible students and the clarity is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and clarity of the screen. It does everything i need it to do. I can get by on one charge for a full day but I don't generally play games on the tablet. I usually just read on it. The stand attached to the tablet is handy to hold while reading or to prop the tablet up.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great device for all things google and net browsing.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this little thing. great screen & clear crisp images. does pretty much everything we could ask of it. except ask it to check your nest cameras. kinda fails at that.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item to anyone. I only bought it because advertised memory life was great. After one month of use, it would not hold a charge for 2 hrs with a minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Lenovo yoga tablet I have bought. The first one lasted me many many years and I was so happy with it, I just had to have another. I use it everyday for web browsing, emailing and games. I love the built in angled stand. Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Right size between laptop and phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just the right size. Easy to hold. Fast connectivity. Long battery life. Apps work well. I am not a gamer, so I can't judge that criterion. Yoga stand comes in handy. I now use this tablet for many day-to day-activities when I don't want to carry/boot-up my laptop and the smartphone is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits into life and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the form factor -- battery as grip is clever and great in daily use, and the different configurations are all handy. And the battery! It just goes and goes! Primary use for this is for reading music, so the battery is a factor. Screen size is barely big enough but it's fine. Lovely tablet -- great for music and for all kinds of other things. It's easy to weave this tablet into daily life.
customer_reviews.author: maryandtimthulson

customer_reviews.title: Never thought i would like an android tablet..
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have an android phone, so the apps cross between the two devices really easily. Big screen, good battery life. The device is stuck on Android 6.01, and there is no micro SD slot. Would get 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: PSP Player

customer_reviews.title: Neat little tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the fold out stand. I have had mine a few months now and so for I love it. Battery last quite a long time, better than expected. The camera is very good and takes a very clear pic. For the money, its a good buy. Even thought about buying another one for the older grandson as a transition between his children's tablet and a lap top.
customer_reviews.author: T Durham

customer_reviews.title: May replace my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for only a few days but it is working well. Large enough screen that I haven't opened my laptop yet. Easy to set up. I haven't found anything to dislike. Larger means larger keyboard so that avoids typos.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Pucino

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for the buck. I use this only as a home control tablet, Nest Cam and thermostat, Lutron Caseta, A/V (Harmony control and it works very well. Display is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can't connect to gaming controllers.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet showed up in perfect condition, however it cannot connect to gaming controllers so I had to return and get a different tablet. I'm so sad this didn't work for what I was looking for because the product is awesome on every other front.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCollough

customer_reviews.title: Rough start
customer_reviews.text: I was locked out the first 24 hrs when I messed up my password after it insisted on two erase everything updates. I had to be patient but now that it's up and running it's a decent tablet.
customer_reviews.author: rodisi

customer_reviews.title: lenovo
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace an older version,love this pretty much the same ,the screen is touchy at times and sometimes lags but once it has been up and running it seems to stabilize
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Stinsman

customer_reviews.title: Slow device
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes to load a YouTube video? No thank you, and that if the device doesn’t crash, there is a reason why it’s so cheap, not good.
customer_reviews.author: Fer Perez

customer_reviews.title: camera comes on arbitrarily, access to control panel hidden ...
customer_reviews.text: camera comes on arbitrarily, access to control panel hidden. bought as gift for senior, much harder to explain that ipad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built-in stand is surprisingly useful
customer_reviews.text: The built in stand is way more useful than I expected it to be. We use this as a kind of ever-ready family tablet. And the rounded bulge on one side actually makes this easier to hold when using for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is functionally useless. It ran rather slow from the beginning but ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is functionally useless. It ran rather slow from the beginning but after a few weeks of use it wouldn't even turn on without a hard reset. The battery seems to drain randomly and rapidly. I may have just gotten a lemon but not knowing for sure I would strongly recommend not purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice surprise, battery last a long time. I use it on my boat for Navigation
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I have had it for a few weeks it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a few weeks it would ask me for updates all the time. Then one day it did an factory update - guess what cant log in it has logged me out if from my google account it is all over you tube. I can t do anything with it now, but return it,.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is not outstanding by any means, it won't win any prizes, but it was cheap and it gets the job done. I bought it primarily for taking notes and answering emails which it does fine. You can truly use any conducting object to write on it, but I have found that when I turn my stylus on it writes more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Iannucci

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright, but not that great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an alright tablet. I wouldn’t recommend it for the price. If it was $50 or so cheaper, maybe. The speakers aren’t that great. I get it’s an older tablet but still.
customer_reviews.author: turboguy327

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice little tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little tablet. I love the stand for when I'm streaming and it makes the tablet easier to hold when you don't want it propped up. I like the camera rotation feature and that the lock screen button is on the top (allows me not to hit a side button and shut it off.)
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my co-worker. He made no complaints. He loves his tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the best tablet I ever had, but today it quit working. Seems amazon only bothers to help for 60 days...not cool. Had excellent customer service from their web site though, so all is good. Back to thinking it's the best tablet ever had. :)
customer_reviews.author: CS Pillsbury

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS VERY WELL. I M SATISFIED WITH THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Manchon

customer_reviews.title: Good but no warranty
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if was specifically my unit. Bought a new unit; no barcode on device. Box had scratched-off barcode; warranty search of scratched-off barcode returned an expired warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good specs, but sluggish
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product. I thought the sound was great, picture was decent. But overall, it's sluggish to open and switch apps, and I found it generally slow to respond to commands. I could only imagine how it would perform in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, keeps restarting itself
customer_reviews.text: Button on the side stopped working and now we can't do anything with the tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Best $200.00 tablet out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest tablet I have ever used. Bright, sharp and responsive, incredibly affordable, easy to hold, and light, this tablet has everything. Synced to my phone with no effort. I have found my tablet for work and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 6 months, though it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 6 months, though it was a little slower than my previous tablet, then just died and could not be recharged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet we own
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet we own. Sharp color, responsive technology, long lasting battery, fun camera (with decent photo ability), and INCREDIBLE built-in stand design.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I thought the Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 would be a slightly improved version of the Tab 2, but the 3 is a major step up. Much sharper screen, and considerably faster. RL Monterey, CA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware of pros & cons!
customer_reviews.text: The Same clutching occurs on this tablet. However~ SO FAR it's Tolerated. Must be Older models Amazon is selling! I STILL prefer the yoga tablet creation / design to All other types. Up to date
customer_reviews.author: Serena Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crazy slow. It works ok for just watching Netflix and stuff but web browsing is just painful. The stand makes it great for viewing. Sound is decent. Camera is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cagle

customer_reviews.title: SLOW
customer_reviews.text: Decent design and great speakers and sound. HOWEVER, it is EXTREMELY slow...Like it is bogged down. I have only loaded a few apps and use it for occasional internet browsing. My smartphone is literally 5 times faster.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: terrific tablet at terrific price
customer_reviews.text: I live and work on this tablet - been a huge positive surprise .... bought one for my whole family
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: The tablet works fine except for problems with the battery suddenly losing power ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet works fine except for problems with the battery suddenly losing power and shutting down. I am in the process now of getting it repaired (after having it less than a month) and so far customer service has been helpful. I will update if/when the issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: 1 million

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money, great battery life put prone to fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely engineered with great sound and a good display. The ability to stand upright on its own is great, as is the battery life. Oleophobic coating would make this even better, as fingerprints tend to be visible on brighter viewing conditions.
customer_reviews.author: richard booth

customer_reviews.title: Consider this ........
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the printing capabilities. Product was in very good condition and shipped fast. Product is also slightly heavy if u need to carry it a lot the stand is a comes in handy,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice system
customer_reviews.text: Made this purchase for my daughter, she wanted\needed a tablet. It works very well for her needs in school and for fun. No major problems and performs up to her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Battery is not what it’s says,, it’s only lady for a few hours and charging it is a pain,,, it will take 2 to 3 days to be fully charge
customer_reviews.author: LiveWire

customer_reviews.title: The speakers are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shape, It's very fast and energy officiant, big sceen. But it is every easy to scratch the back and easy to break the screen because my sceen is already broken in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Isdor I

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware at the time of purchase that there was no sim card slot. Machine has trouble connecting to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tablet, so far so good. The only thing I don't like is, when I am typing the keyboard and screen seems to glitch a bit and I hope this doesn't lead to future problems. .
customer_reviews.author: Temisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good Android pad/tablet...very very good.
customer_reviews.text: A damn good value..wish I could buy one for evertbody. MUCH better than it should be for the price. A full 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend that product, very slow old wireless standard.
customer_reviews.author: Analustia

customer_reviews.title: GPS works great for boating
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new boater and I love using this with navionics. Don’t need a to be online. Works off a satellite.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hill

customer_reviews.title: NICE TABLET
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR , SO GOOD. I LOVE THE STAND , HOW THE SCREEN FEEL , THE SOUND , THE FAST BLUETOOTH CONNECTION. I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: david2011

customer_reviews.title: More than i can ask for
customer_reviews.text: For this price it works great, and has good quality streams
customer_reviews.author: Andre dennis

customer_reviews.title: Value Tab
customer_reviews.text: The tab itself is excellent and I like it. Waiting for the android upgrade supposed to come is Dec. Several needed apps dont work with current version of androis. Only negative is that stand - bulks up the tab compared to ipad mini, but at 1/3 the cost it's great. Has long battery life but also takes long to charge up again. A faster charger would be nice
customer_reviews.author: celamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an alternative to an MP3 player. Works fantastic with my blue tooth stereo in my truck. Love the ability to shuffle the music.
customer_reviews.author: Brett E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: best 8 inch tablet i have found cant beet the ...
customer_reviews.text: best 8 inch tablet i have found cant beet the price, it has clean lines. had to find a case for so would recommend getting a small bag to keep it it like
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: While this is lovely to look at, i've had a couple of issues with connectivity with the Browser, Also, slow load times. Overall, it was worth the money, as I got it at a very good sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianon

customer_reviews.title: great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Mom because it has the same OS as her phone. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Pampuch

customer_reviews.title: Needs update.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy that there is not an update for the OS. And it can't even play a simple game from the play store without freezing. I'm disappointed. But build is great. Streaming is also good. Needs a update bad!
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Stand is great
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my grandmother after shoulder surgery. Stand worked great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Disconnects WiFi
customer_reviews.text: When I connect Bluetooth headphones, WiFi stops working. Screen resolution is fair. Battery life is excellent.. Sound is really good. But, according to post I’ve read in looking for a solution, many others have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Noble

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet because it had fairly decent reviews, including a pretty good review/recommendation by CNET. I am so disappointed. It runs slow, freezes up often, and takes forever to charge to 100%. Fully charged, I only get about 3 days use until I have to charge again. My widgets keep moving around, and some apps have disappeared completely. I have had to re-install some. I wasted money on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Lenovo Yoga Tab ZA0H0064US Tablet, 10.1" (Slate Black)
product_meta.description: Size:2 GB RAM | 16 GB SSD| Style:10.1"Unlike your TV, the Yoga Tab 3 10 lets you enjoy your favourite shows anytime, anywhere. While its vibrant display delivers great video, powerful speakers emit truly immersive audio. And thanks to its epic battery life, you can binge-watch on the go. What's more, a rotating camera lets you snap pictures like never before. Now, can your TV do that?.
feature_bullets: Enhanced multimode tablet with four usage modes: Hold, Tilt, Stand, and Hang
Brilliant 10.1" HD IPS display perfect for casual gaming and watching movies
Delivers right home theatre sound with Dolby Atmos speakers
Marathon battery life of up to 18 hours.Wireless LAN:802.11 b/g/n, 2.4 GHz, with Bluetooth 4.0.Battery Standby Time : Up to 125 Days
